children.name: heading
children.description: A heading that shows at the top of the hero banner and describes the page.

children.name: description
children.description: A couple of sentences that provide more information about the heading.

children.name: button_text
children.description: The button text that describes the call to action the user should take.

children.name: button_link
children.description: The URL that a user should be taken to when they click the button.

children.name: heading
children.description: A couple of words that describes the name of this pricing plan.

children.name: description
children.description: A 2-3 sentence describing who this pricing plan is best suited for.

children.name: price
children.description: The price of the plan. An example of this would be '$10'.

children.name: time_period
children.description: The time period that the price covers. An example of this would be '/month'.

children.name: features_title
children.description: The title that shows above a list of features that is included in this pricing plan.

children.name: feature_one
children.description: The first feature of the pricing plan.

children.name: feature_two
children.description: The second feature of the pricing plan.

children.name: feature_three
children.description: The third feature of the pricing plan.

children.name: feature_four
children.description: The fourth feature of the pricing plan.

children.description: The button text that describes the call to action the user should take.

children.name: button_link
children.description: The URL that a user should be taken to when they click the button.
